unnormalised: Hey! Loved the piece on athlete biographies. Really inspiring stuff! Reminded me of the struggles faced by many, like in "Chak De! India". Imagine the dedication! Any chance of a biography on someone from IIT Madras' sports team? Or maybe a look at PT Usha's journey? Truly inspiring for all the kids aiming for the stars, across 100s of kms and lakhs of Rs. spent. We need more stories like these!
